bug.author: jlewi
bug.summary: Should spartakus usageId be set in kustomize.go and not gcp.go?
bug.description:
We are currently setting the spartakus usage id here
kubeflow/bootstrap/pkg/kfapp/gcp/gcp.go
Line 1583 in 865f10e
for _, comp := range gcp.Spec.Components {
But this code is only invoked for GCP. We probably need to move this into kustomize.go so we do it always; not just for gcp
